message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice, how about a more even split this time?
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Alice, let's be real, the longer this goes on the less we both get. 50/50 is the only fair outcome.
I see you're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but that's it.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise a bit, but this needs to be reasonable. Time is running out for both of us.
You're running out of time, Bob. I'll give you a little, but I'm not going below this.
